introduction.title: 1. Introduction
introduction.content: Patrick Travel Services ("we", "our", or "us") is committed to protecting your privacy. This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, disclose, and safeguard your information when you use our mobile application.

informationWeCollect.title: 2. Information We Collect
informationWeCollect.personalInfoList:
• Name (first and last name)
• Email address
• Phone number
• Immigration case details
• Uploaded documents (passports, IDs, travel documents)
• Chat messages with advisors
informationWeCollect.technicalInfoList:
• Device information (model, OS version)
• Push notification tokens
• IP address
• App usage data
• Crash reports and diagnostics

howWeUseInfo.title: 3. How We Use Your Information
howWeUseInfo.content:
We use your information to:

• Provide immigration consultation services
• Process and manage your cases
• Communicate with you about your cases
• Send push notifications for updates
• Store and manage your documents securely
• Improve our services
• Comply with legal obligations
• Prevent fraud and ensure security

thirdPartyServices.title: 4. Third-Party Services
thirdPartyServices.content: We use the following third-party services:
thirdPartyServices.firebaseList:
• Authentication
• Real-time database
• Cloud messaging
• Analytics
thirdPartyServices.note: These services may collect information as described in their respective privacy policies.

dataSecurity.title: 5. Data Security
dataSecurity.content:
We implement industry-standard security measures:

• End-to-end encryption for data transmission (HTTPS/TLS)
• Encrypted storage in device keychain
• Secure authentication with Firebase
• Regular security audits
• Access controls and authentication
• Biometric authentication option (Face ID/Touch ID)

yourRights.title: 6. Your Rights (GDPR)
yourRights.dataPortabilityDesc:
Export your data in JSON format
•
yourRights.contactNote: To exercise these rights, contact us at: privacy@patricktravel.com

dataRetention.title: 7. Data Retention
dataRetention.content:
We retain your data for as long as:

• Your account is active
• Necessary to provide services
• Required by law (typically 7 years for immigration documents)

When you delete your account, we permanently erase your personal data within 30 days, except where legal obligations require retention.

childrensPrivacy.title: 8. Children's Privacy
childrensPrivacy.content: Our service is not intended for users under 18 years of age. We do not knowingly collect personal information from children.

internationalTransfers.title: 9. International Data Transfers
internationalTransfers.content: Your information may be transferred to and processed in countries outside your country of residence. We ensure appropriate safeguards are in place to protect your data in compliance with GDPR.

changesToPolicy.title: 10. Changes to This Policy
changesToPolicy.content: We may update this Privacy Policy from time to time. We will notify you of any changes by posting the new policy in the app and updating the "Last updated" date.

contactUs.title: 11. Contact Us
contactUs.content: For questions about this Privacy Policy or to exercise your rights:
contactUs.address:
Address: 123 Immigration Plaza, Suite 200
Toronto, ON M5H 2N2, Canada
contactUs.supportHours: Support Hours: Monday-Friday, 9:00 AM - 6:00 PM EST

terms.title: Terms and Conditions

acceptance.title: 1. Acceptance of Terms
acceptance.content: By accessing and using the Patrick Travel Services mobile application, you accept and agree to be bound by these Terms and Conditions. If you disagree with any part of these terms, you must not use our application.

serviceDescription.title: 2. Service Description
serviceDescription.content:
Patrick Travel Services provides immigration consultation services through our mobile application, including:

• Case management and tracking
• Document upload and verification
• Real-time communication with advisors
• Push notifications for updates
• Access to immigration resources and FAQs

userAccounts.title: 3. User Accounts
userAccounts.accountCreationList:
• You must provide accurate and complete information
• You are responsible for maintaining account security
• You must be at least 18 years old
• One account per person
userAccounts.accountSecurityList:
• Keep your password confidential
• Notify us immediately of unauthorized access
• You are responsible for all activities under your account

acceptableUse.title: 4. Acceptable Use
acceptableUse.content:
You agree NOT to:

• Violate any laws or regulations
• Upload false or misleading documents
• Impersonate another person
• Interfere with the app's operation
• Use the service for unauthorized purposes
• Share your account with others
• Attempt to access unauthorized areas
• Upload malicious content or viruses

intellectualProperty.title: 5. Intellectual Property
intellectualProperty.content: All content, features, and functionality of the app are owned by Patrick Travel Services and protected by international copyright, trademark, and other intellectual property laws.

documentUpload.title: 6. Document Upload and Storage
documentUpload.content:
• You grant us permission to store and process your uploaded documents
• You are responsible for the accuracy of uploaded documents
• We use secure third-party storage (UploadThing)
• Documents are retained as long as your account is active or as required by law
• You can delete documents at any time

serviceLimitations.title: 7. Service Limitations
serviceLimitations.limitationsList:
• Visa or immigration approval
• Uninterrupted service availability
• Error-free operation
• Specific processing times
serviceLimitations.note: Immigration outcomes depend on government authorities, not our service. We provide consultation and support but cannot control final decisions.

feesAndPayment.title: 8. Fees and Payment
feesAndPayment.content:
• Service fees are communicated before case submission
• Payment terms are specified in your service agreement
• Fees are non-refundable except as required by law
• We reserve the right to modify fees with notice

termination.title: 9. Termination
termination.youMayList:
• Delete your account at any time from app settings
• Data will be permanently deleted within 30 days
termination.weMayList:
• Suspend or terminate accounts for Terms violations
• Terminate service with 30 days notice
• Retain data as required by law after termination

limitationOfLiability.title: 10. Limitation of Liability
limitationOfLiability.content:
Patrick Travel Services shall not be liable for:

• Immigration application rejections
• Delays in processing by government authorities
• Loss of data due to circumstances beyond our control
• Indirect, incidental, or consequential damages

Our total liability is limited to the fees paid for services.

indemnification.title: 11. Indemnification
indemnification.content: You agree to indemnify and hold Patrick Travel Services harmless from any claims, damages, or expenses arising from your use of the app or violation of these Terms.

disputeResolution.title: 12. Dispute Resolution
disputeResolution.content:
• Disputes will be resolved through good-faith negotiation
• If unresolved, binding arbitration will be used
• Governing law: Ontario, Canada
• Venue: Toronto, Ontario, Canada

changesToTerms.title: 13. Changes to Terms
changesToTerms.content: We reserve the right to modify these Terms at any time. Changes will be effective immediately upon posting in the app. Your continued use constitutes acceptance of modified Terms.

contactInformation.title: 14. Contact Information
contactInformation.address:
Address: 123 Immigration Plaza, Suite 200
Toronto, ON M5H 2N2, Canada
contactInformation.supportHours: Support Hours: Monday-Friday, 9:00 AM - 6:00 PM EST

terms.disclaimer: By using Patrick Travel Services, you acknowledge that you have read, understood, and agree to be bound by these Terms and Conditions and our Privacy Policy.
